definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: You need natural ways to improve sperm counts.
sentences.chinese: 不过，你仍需要用自然的方式来提高精子数。

sentences.english: Objective To study the changes of sperm quality in mice treated with manganous chloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究用氯化锰处理的小鼠精子质量的变化。

sentences.english: The blood group antigens in the spermatozoa are inherent, not from the seminal plasma.
sentences.chinese: 精子血型抗原为本身所固有，并非来源于精浆。

sentences.english: Only one sperm fertilizes an egg.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个精子使卵子受精。

sentences.english: Six more test-tubes of spermatozoa were upset.
sentences.chinese: 又有六支精子管打翻了。

sentences.english: He put some of his sperm in a syringe and gave it to Piper.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己的精子射在一支注射器里交给Piper。

sentences.english: Sperm must be capacitated before sperm ovum fusion.
sentences.chinese: 精卵融合之前精子必须获能。

sentences.english: There was also evidence gum disease in men impaired their sperm quality.
sentences.chinese: 同时，证据也表明牙病还会削弱男性的精子质量。

sentences.english: The sperm contacts with vitelline membrane by its radial arms of the nucleus, and undergoes acrosome reaction immediately.
sentences.chinese: 精子以其核突起附着在卵膜上，并迅速发生顶体反应。

sentences.english: It spurns delay and pointless diplomacy. An army of sperm must assault an ova and overcome it.
sentences.chinese: 精子大军必须侵入一个卵子并且占有它。

sentences.english: It is still not clear if the cola or the unhealthy lifestyle, or both, is to blame.
sentences.chinese: 现在仍不清楚致使精子数减少的诱因是什么？

sentences.english: Conclusion NFZ induced the apoptosis of testicular cells.
sentences.chinese: 结论呋喃唑酮可促进精子细胞凋亡。

sentences.english: The binding site of diethylstilbestrol may be oestrogen receptor on sperm surface.
sentences.chinese: 乙烯雌酚作用部位可能与精子雌激素受体有关。

sentences.english: The sperm of male Xylotechus rusticus composed of head and tail.
sentences.chinese: 青杨脊虎天牛雄虫精子分为头部和尾部。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the chromosomal aneuploid incidence of severe oligozoospermia spermatozoa.
sentences.chinese: 目的检测严重少精子症患者精子染色体非整倍体。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the chromosomal aneuploid incidence of severe oligozoospermia spermatozoa.
sentences.chinese: 目的检测严重少精子症患者精子染色体非整倍体。
